import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import SelectFilter from './select' import AddArticle from './addArticle' import toggleOpenDecorator from '../decorators/toggleOpenDecorator' import logo from '../logo.svg' import Menu from './menu' function Header({toggleOpenAdd, toggleOpenSelect, isOpenSelect,isOpenAdd}){ Header.propTypes = { isOpenSelect: PropTypes.bool, isOpenAdd: PropTypes.bool, toggleOpenAdd: PropTypes.func.isRequired, toggleOpenSelect: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } return(

AVANGARD RUSSIAN BOOK

ASSOCIATIONS, GROUPS AND PUBLISHING HOUSES

{ openSelect({isOpenSelect})} { openAdd({isOpenAdd}) }
) function openSelect({isOpenSelect}){ return (isOpenSelect ? : null) } function openAdd ({openAdd}) { return (isOpenAdd ? : null) } } export default toggleOpenDecorator(Header)
